Scheme 1 Synthesis of f-keto sulfones from unsaturated compounds andsulfonyl radicals.

Scheme 2. Scope of alkynes 1. Reaction conditions: undivided cell, graphitetrod electrode (anode) (p = 6 mm), platinum plate electrode (cathode)(1.0 cm x 1.0cm x 0.3 mm), constant current=9 ma, 1 (0.3 mmol), 2a(0.75 mmol, 2.5 equiv), nBu,NBF, 0.5 mmol), MeCN (5.0 mL), H2O (04 mL),rt, 6 h. Yields are reported for isolated products after purification. Faradaicefficiency of reaction of substrates measured under constant currentconditions. [a] The reaction was extended to 8 h.

Scheme 3. Scope of sulfonyl hydrazides 2. Reaction conditions: undividedcell, graphite rod electrode (anode) (p=6 mm), platinum plate electrode(cathode) [1.0 cm x 1.0cm x 0.3 mm), constant current = 9 mA, 1a(0.3 mmol), 2 (0.75 mmol, 2.5 equiv), nBu,NBF, (0,5 mmol), MeCN (5.0 mL),H2O (04 mL), rt, 6 h. Yields are reported for isolated products afterpurification. Faradaic efficiency of reaction of substrates measured underconstant current conditions. [a] The reaction was extended to 8 h.
